metadata.dc:author: Silva-Herzog, D
Calderón, A
metadata.dc:description: Purpose of this paper is to undertake a bibliographical review on the diagnosis, prevention and treatment of pain in endodoncy, in order to provide the reader with an updated guide on the clinical control of pain of dental origin.
metadata.dc:title: Diagnóstico, prevención y tratamiento de las agudizaciones en endodoncia.
[Diagnosis, prevention and treatment of endodontic exacerbations].
